if some words are beeing said, and if the words will be understandable, the=
n
a message is available. 
if a word or a message is not to understand, and=
 if we tend to interpreting
the words, then the message are not existent.
i=
 dont think it exist "if you can not understand, then the message is not
fo=
r you". that=B4s too simple.
 
salvi

  _____  

Von: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.c=
om [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] Im Auftrag von
Ursula Kalin
Gesendet: D=
ienstag, 27. Juli 2010 19:30
An: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Betreff: Re: [EVP-=
ITC] Re: depressing,


  


sometime you may not hear what another hear bec=
ause its NOT for you to hear
its a message for the person doing the session=
...just because you don't hear
does NOT mean thats not whats being said...a=
re you aware of this?


  _____  

From: Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@...>
T=
o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tue, July 27, 2010 12:16:10 PM
Subject: Re=
: [EVP-ITC] Re: depressing,

  


I make a separate folder for each set of =
files, e.g. "Greenwood Cemetery
5-12-07" and then put the files in the fold=
er with numbers, e.g. "001.mp3"
or "DSC0001.jpg". That way, the files do no=
t have any distinctive name but
they are all organized.

Zack

 
On Tue, Ju=
l 27, 2010 at 10:30 AM, <SnowfireL@aol. com
<mailto:SnowfireL@...> > wr=
ote:


  




I could, but it's hard to keep track, i have hundreds of file=
s on my pc, and
I have to write it down, i want to see if anyone else is ab=
le to hear these
few, I have other's on this child too, with my voice, and =
his name and
stuff, but i didn't want to post them, i hope he is found aliv=
e.  Spirit
say, he is over there in rest plane, with other spirit children,=
 i guess he
is now in the spiritual baby land.  sf


-----Original Message-=
----
From: Rj <rasterer@yahoo. com <mailto:rasterer@...> >
To: EVP-IT=
C@yahoogroups  <mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> .com

Sent: Tue, Jul 27, 20=
10 11:26 am
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: depressing,


  
When you label the =
files with what you heard, you influence the listener to
try to hear what y=
ou heard, rather than what they hear with no hints.  So if
you want to know=
 what people really hear without your hints, you need to
send them out unla=
beled.

<SnowfireL@aol. com <mailto:SnowfireL@...> > wrote:

 <mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> .com

-----Ori=
ginal Message-----
From: Rj <rasterer@yahoo. com>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .=
com
Sent: Tue, Jul 27, 2010 10:54 am
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: depressing,=



  

If there is a chance you might be able to stop this Morgan person fr=
om
hurting another child, you must call now.   Waiting so that you don't lo=
ok
wrong or silly is not the priority here: there are more important things=
 on
the line than personal ego (I hope).



--- On Tue, 7/27/10, SnowfireL@=
aol. com <SnowfireL@aol. com> wrote:




From: SnowfireL@aol. com <Snowfire=
L@aol. com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: depressing,
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups =
.com
Date: Tuesday, July 27, 2010, 7:38 AM


  
No, and no, this is a young=
er child, recently missing, I have not called
yet, I want to see if anyone =
can hear what I am hearing yet before I let
them know.  I got names, and th=
e little guy, I think said "hi" to me.  At
this point no one else is able t=
o hear my files, so I won't do a thing until
i get validation from the so-c=
alled living first. sf



-----Original Message-----
From: rasterer <raster=
er@yahoo. com>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Sent: Tue, Jul 27, 2010 9:34 am=

Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: depressing,


  
Do you mean the missing 7-year-old=
 Oregon boy named Kyron Horman?

Have you told the police that Morgan has h=
im? Have you told them what you
know?

owfireL@.. . wrote:
>

but 
> it is on file, sad to hear. sf
